Class Spot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.app.Spot

  • public class Spot
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the spots on the board

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the spot, and activates the card action if the spot still has a card
      java.lang.String draw()
      Returns a string which represents the status of the spot, including all the players
      void flipCard()
      Flips the card when the player has activated the card, makes hasCard variable false
      Card getCard()
      Returns the card of this spot
      int getNumber()
      Returns the number where the spot is placed on the board
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Return a list of all the players on this spot
      boolean hasCard()
      Returns the value of hasCard variable
      void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes the player from the spot
      void setCard(Card card)
      Sets the card of this spot

        Returns the value of hasCard variable

        Flips the card when the player has activated the card, makes hasCard variable false
